entry.dcterms:description: expectations and attitudes towards the economic and social roles taken by the state; opinions about the current economic processes; attitudes towards the new political system, the objective social status of respondents; the social character of recent changes and subjective opinions about them

person
survey data
cross-section
In addition to Hungary, Poland and Czechoslovakia also participated in the investigation. All of them are national representative samples, Hungarian 1500, Polish 1491, Czech 1187, Slovak 817 persons.
face-to-face interview
